turns.answer: You may not have been in this game. You may not even know you are a mafia. You may have been with some friends, maybe a family member, or just plain old people. It may be one of a series of questions that
turns.label: truth

In a hotel room with a manager and you two going to a party. You were playing with the manager. Did the manager ever tell you about your trip to Italy?
